wiserow 0.1.2.9000

Wiserow

Multi-threaded, coercion-free implementations of common row-wise operations.

Fast row-oriented operations implemented in C++, all of which are multi-threaded by leveraging RcppParallel and RcppThread. Virtually no deep copies of input data are made, even of character data thanks to Boost’s string_ref. In contrast to other functions, the ones in this package support data frames with differently typed columns as input without coercion to a matrix, performing on-the-fly type promotion following R rules, where necessary.
